name: Illusion Asylum
description:
It was cold and dark...
the events leading up to that moment were blurry...

...only he who can see through the devil's eye shall see the light.

Illusion Asylum is a 1st person adventure where you explore a mysterious temple in order to find your way back home.

This version is only a prototype so features are very limited.

Features:
  • A Couple of Puzzles;
  • Black & White pixelated 3D enviroment; 
  • Music by Andrew Hind;
  • Controller support;

CONTROLS 

  • Keyboard: W, A, S, D or Arrows, LMB or Spacebar;
  • Alternatively, a controller's left and right joysticks and a button; 

Created for the OUYA Winter Jam 2021 but did not run on it properly...

    

NOTES:  Android build is for OUYA devices.

The OUYA version suffers of low frame rate and some features were removed, and so, future support for that system is not expected on this project.
